title: 🚀 Welcome to the MoBank Announcement System!
body:
We've added an official announcements panel! 🎉 Stay updated with the latest MoBank changes, events, and major flex moments.

Here’s how it works:

  • 📌 Pinned announcements appear first.
  • 📰 New announcements are posted here.
  • 🛠️ Click here to view your MoBank profile.

title: 🎉 MoBank Giveaway Results!
body:
Luke Collingridge went absolutely crazy and gave away 400 MoBucks! 💰

Winners have been notified. Enjoy your new wealth!

title: 🔧 Developer Badge Officially Added
body:
To ensure that absolute power is recognized, Luke Collingridge now has an official 🛠️ next to his name in the leaderboard.

Check it out in the leaderboard now!

title: 📈 MoBank Economy Update
body:
With the recent MoBuck giveaway, we’ve seen an inflation spike of 2000%.

What does this mean for the future? Probably nothing. But it sounds cool.

title: 🛡️ Security Patch: No More Exploits
body: After some "testing" (not hacking, I swear), we’ve patched a major exploit that allowed infinite MoBuck farming. If you were using it, no you weren’t. 😂
